hiveArticle.title: A Beautiful Flower Clicked on Beautiful Sunday
hiveArticle.body:
I went to get my groceries, just outside of the store there was few pots kept. Some of the pots had flowers blooming. I tried to click the macro photo of the flower. When you tried to capture macro, the only thing you need to keep in mind is that your hand is very still, I tried to do that but was not fully done.

Though the Colors of the flower came out really well.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/f8lv70woi5.jpg)

In Black And White

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/nul8fzym79.jpg)

Which one among the above two you liked the most and why?

ðŸ“· Camera: Nokia 6
